action.content:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: The image shows a well-lit, upscale living room. There's a large window with light-colored blinds on the left side, offering a view of greenery outside. A fireplace is centered on the back wall, above which hangs a piece of artwork. To the right of the fireplace is a built-in bookcase with decorative items. Two gray sofas face each other, separated by a coffee table with a decorative bowl of fruit. A large potted plant stands near the window. The room
action.label: response

action.content: guide

You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows a well-lit, upscale living room. There's a large window with light-colored blinds on the left side, offering a view of greenery outside. A fireplace is centered on the back wall, above which hangs a piece of artwork. To the right of the fireplace is a built-in bookcase with decorative items. Two gray sofas face each other, separated by a coffee table with a decorative bowl of fruit. A large potted plant stands near the window. The room.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['south', 'north']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}
action.label: context

action.content: QUESTION: Is there a fireplace in the image? And are there two gray sofas facing each other?
action.label: response

action.content: explorer
question: is there a fireplace in the image? and are there two gray sofas facing each other?
action.label: context

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, there is a fireplace in the image, centered on the back wall. And yes, there are two gray sofas facing each other, separated by a coffee table.
